sentences.en: " This will give us safer and more effective vaccine delivery, " he says.
sentences.cn: 他说, “ 这样我们接受的疫苗注射就会更安全有效. ”

sentences.en: a polio vaccine
sentences.cn: 小儿麻痹症疫苗

sentences.en: By delivering on these priorities, we can ensure that this polio vaccine, other vaccines and lifesaving medicines get to all those who need them.
sentences.cn: 通过实施这些重点，我们能够保证向所有需求者提供这一脊髓灰质炎疫苗、其它疫苗和拯救生命的药物。

sentences.en: Doctors worried that there would not be enough vaccine for everyone who needed it.
sentences.cn: 医生担心没有足够的疫苗给每个需要的人。

sentences.en: How do I know which mumps vaccine I or my child should be vaccinated with?
sentences.cn: 如何知道我或我的孩子该接种何种流行性腮腺炎疫苗？

sentences.en: It is a good vaccine, particularly in pigs fed on swill.
sentences.cn: 这是一种良好的疫苗, 尤其对喂饲残羹的猪.

sentences.en: Painful typhoid injections are a thing of the past, thanks to the introduction of an oral vaccine.
sentences.cn: 自从发明了口服疫苗后，令人痛苦的伤寒疫苗注射就成为了过去。

sentences.en: Roll on the day someone develops an effective vaccine against malaria.
sentences.cn: 盼望有一天有人会研制出一种能有效预防疟疾的疫苗。

sentences.en: Seven million doses of vaccine are annually given to British children.
sentences.cn: 英国孩子每年要接种7百万剂疫苗。

sentences.en: She takes a vaccine against influenza every fall.
sentences.cn: 她每年秋季接种流感疫苗.

sentences.en: So what does the vaccine do?
sentences.cn: 那么这疫苗是如何生效的呢？

sentences.en: The monkeys had been immunized with a vaccine made from infected cells.
sentences.cn: 这些猴子已经注射了由受感染的细胞培养而成的疫苗。

sentences.en: The new vaccine may rid the world of one of its most terrifying diseases.
sentences.cn: 这种新疫苗可能会消除世界上最可怕的一种疾病。

sentences.en: The polio vaccine has saved millions of lives.
sentences.cn: 脊髓灰质炎疫苗挽救了数以百万计的生命.

sentences.en: The researchers hope that such a vaccine could be available in about ten years' time.
sentences.cn: 研究人员期望能在大约10年内研制出这样的疫苗。

sentences.en: The vaccine had been produced by an unconventional technique.
sentences.cn: 该疫苗是用非传统工艺生产的。

sentences.en: The vaccine represents a quantum leap in healthcare.
sentences.cn: 这种疫苗的问世是医疗保健领域的重大突破。

sentences.en: There have been problems with the formulation of the vaccine.
sentences.cn: 疫苗的配方有些问题。

sentences.en: This vaccine is not normally provided free under the NHS.
sentences.cn: 这种疫苗在国民医疗保健系统中通常不是免费提供的。

sentences.en: When he tested an early vaccine on himself, some described the act as foolhardy.
sentences.cn: 当他在自己身上试验还处在初级阶段的疫苗时，有些人说他的行为是蛮干。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 乙肝疫苗；乙型肝炎疫苗
天花疫苗；牛痘苗；天花菌苗

trans.tran_en: a substance which contains a weak form of the bacteria or virus that causes a disease and is used to protect people from that disease
